name: Finary.com
headline: The new wealth manager for Europe
description: Finary is empowers retail investors to grow their empire by tracking, managing & investing their money on one App.

founders.name: Mounir Laggoune, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Finary. Ex-Trainline, Captain Train, Yoopies. Loves cycling, playing tennis, and being outdoors.

founders.name: Julien Blancher, Founder
founders.description: 👋 I’m working on Finary and attending 24h of Le Mans as a gentleman driver. Dev, infra. Previously co-founder @recastai (sold to SAP).

generated_description:
Finary.com is your next-gen wealth manager for Europe, aimed squarely at retail investors. Founded in 2020 and hailing from Paris, France, Finary has positioned itself as a one-stop app for users to track, manage, and invest their money—all in one convenient place. Think of it as a digital assistant for your finances. 

Finary is part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W21, which underscores its innovative edge in the fintech realm, alongside its classifications as a fintech, investing platform, and neobank. The team is small but mighty, consisting of just five employees, yet it’s packed with potential. They’re guided by Nicolas Dessaigne, a group partner who likely has the vision to steer the company toward success.

The platform’s mission is clear: to empower users to grow their financial empires, making wealth management accessible and straightforward for everyone. You can check them out at [finary.com](https://finary.com/en).

In an era where managing finances can feel overwhelming, Finary seems to be carving a niche that helps demystify investing and wealth management, one user at a time.
